summary: Provides a SLURM-specific environment plugin for Lightning Fabric, detecting when code runs under a SLURM scheduler, extracting job and node information, managing process groups, handling signals, and configuring the runtime for distributed training on SLURM clusters.
business_intent: Allow users to seamlessly launch and manage Lightning Fabric workloads on SLURM-managed HPC systems without manual configuration, ensuring correct rank assignment, resource allocation, and graceful termination.
